I have multiple yellow, irritated spots under my eyes that began as red spots, which then enlarged, bled, and eventually scabbed over with yellow material.

I have had these symptoms for about four months.
Do you have similar spots elsewhere on your body?
No, I do not have similar spots elsewhere on my body.

No, I do not have any known allergies and I have not used any new facial creams, topical treatments, or new medications.

No, I do not have any history of skin conditions or dermatitis in my family.

No, I haven't experienced any pain, itching, or burning sensation in the affected area.
Final Diagnosis: Xanthelasma
